hero.title: Deterministic clinical rehearsal for primary care teams.
hero.description: Clinical Copilot pairs ambient voice capture with curated references to support decision-making in real time. The sandbox assembles differentials, workups, and documentation cues while keeping clinicians fully in control.

principles.title: How we build trust
principles.description: Clinical Copilot is guided by three principles that keep the experience safe, effective, and clinician-ledâ€”prioritizing expertise, evidence-based medicine, and patient privacy at every step.

items.title: Physician-centered design
points: Every recommendation requires explicit physician review and approval before implementation.
Critical alerts and red-flag warnings are surfaced immediately for clinician assessment.
Complete audit trails ensure full accountability and transparency in clinical decision-making.

items.title: Evidence-based guidance
points: Differential considerations draw from clinical guidelines and evidence-based protocols.
Treatment suggestions are aligned with current best practices and medical standards.
Fixtures are reviewed regularly to reflect updated references and stay aligned with published pathways.

items.title: Patient privacy first
points: Informed consent is required before any decision-support workflow begins.
Patients maintain full control over their data with the ability to opt out at any time.
All patient information stays local to the browser during demos with export under clinician control.

workflow.title: Seamless integration into your practice
workflow.description: Clinical Copilot follows a structured five-phase workflow designed to support physicians throughout the patient encounter. Each phase includes built-in checkpoints that ensure physician oversight while streamlining documentation and decision support.

steps.title: Patient Consent
steps.detail: Secure informed consent process ensures both patient and physician understand the guided documentation workflow.

steps.title: Ambient Capture
steps.detail: Voice recognition captures the natural patient-physician conversation along with vital signs and examination findings in real time.

steps.title: Guided Analysis
steps.detail: Curated rules process clinical data to generate differential diagnoses, identify diagnostic gaps, and recommend evidence-based workups.

steps.title: Clinical Review
steps.detail: Physicians review surfaced insights including safety alerts, diagnostic recommendations, and treatment options with full clinical context.

steps.title: Documentation
steps.detail: System generates comprehensive clinical notes ready for EHR integration, requiring only physician review and electronic signature.
